title: Do You Love Cheesman Park? Then you will love this  apartment!
posting_body: This cozy home is nestled in the perfect location between City Park and Congress Park.
The local Southside dive bar is the perfect spot for a fun evening and Illegal Pete’s will bring both good food and a hip vibe.
